title: Happily Ever After
body: That is not a punctual ending; it's just more story.
But, there's an end somewhere in all that ever after.
It's a languishing end nobody knew happened,
It's the worst kind of end.
I think that's why I go back, sharp tongued, pen in hand, and right on top of those 3 stupid words, add one big sloppy exclamation point!
Maybe it's a bad ending, but it's still not the worst ending.
